us.title: Us
us.description: We are a design duo based in the intersection of strategy and aesthetics. Our work spans brand identity, digital experiences, and editorial design. We believe in the power of restraint—that what you leave out matters as much as what you include.

members.name: Alex Chen
members.bio: With a background in architecture and graphic design, Alex brings spatial thinking to every project.

members.name: Jordan Ellis
members.bio: Jordan's background in typography and motion design adds depth and movement to our visual language.
